subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Discrimination
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Derrick Gordon, a guard for the University of Massachusetts, was in Indianapolis to watch the Final Four, as was Jason Collins, the retired N.B.A. center who came out as a gay in 2013.
snippet: Derrick Gordon, a guard for the University of Massachusetts, was in Indianapolis to watch the Final Four, as was Jason Collins, the retired N.B.A. center who came out as a gay in 2013.
